attributes.action: help solve conflict in Sri lanka
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
War has torn Sri Lanka apart. Maids are being abused in Saudi Arabia in foreign exchange by SL gov.. I petition that the people who have committed crimes in SL are brought to justice in a fair trial and put in a safe, approved prison.
Also, I ask that people who are guilty of the following crimes towards maids in SL & Saudi Arabia are also brought to justice under the same conditions:
•      Abuse
•      Ignoring their plight
•      Sending them to countries, knowing they were being abused for their own gain.

I also ask all governments to sanction the people guilty of crime such as the government and put pressure on them to change their ways or else let a government more able to turn he country around for better take over. I petition the government to assist in these things for the better of Sri Lanka.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
